description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. It outlines the exploration of the inner world of the mind, via esoteric meditations and/or psychoactive substances. Study this and you will become awakened to your psychic potential.

use_action.name: Study
use_action.message: You read the journal and meditate upon the lessons.

description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. It outlines the exploration of the inner world of the mind, via esoteric meditations and/or psychoactive substances. This won't be useful for learning powers any longer, but is still a handy reference.

A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. Written by someone already versed in the field of psychic studies, it focuses on defending yourself from the forces of the Beyond. Probably of limited use in the pre-Cataclysm days, but now a VERY valuable talent to have. Study this and you will learn how to defend your psyche.

use_action.name: Study
use_action.message: You read the journal and meditate upon the lessons.

description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. Written by someone already versed in the field of psychic studies, it focuses on defending yourself from the forces of the Beyond. This won't be useful for learning powers any longer, but is still a handy reference.

A small notebook full of scrawled writing and various diagrams. The contents focus on meditation, breathing exercises, and various forms of mind-over-matter tricks as practiced by monastic orders, stage magicians, etc. Not out of place for your average pulp adventurer stuck in a lamissary in Tibet. Study this and you will learn how to convert your inner strength into physical power.

use_action.name: Study
use_action.message: You read the journal and meditate upon the lessons.

description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. The contents focus on meditation, breathing exercises, and various forms of mind-over-matter tricks as practiced by monastic orders, stage magicians, etc. This won't be useful for learning powers any longer, but is still a handy reference.

A small notebook full of scrawled writing and various diagrams. This one is...creepy. It discusses bending your inner strength to 'cloud men's minds' and subject them to your will. DEFINITELY not out of place for your average pulp adventurer stuck in a lamissary in Tibet, but of dubious morality. Then again, what's morality in this world anymore? Study this and you will learn how to mesmerise people for various purposes.

use_action.name: Study
use_action.message: You read the journal and meditate upon the lessons.

description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. The contents focus on mental influence and 'clouding men's minds'. This won't be useful for learning powers any longer, but is still a handy reference.

A small notebook full of scrawled writing and various diagrams. At this point the author has apparently gone off the deep end and is discussing how to make crystals out of thin air via your inner strength, albeit with fatigue. It's really no more insane than walking dead bodies or flaming eyeballs wandering out of glowing portals, and it's likely that you've already learned how to do other mental tricks at this point, so why not go for it? Study this and you will learn to create psychic crystals.

use_action.name: Study
use_action.message: You read the journal and meditate upon the lessons.

description: A small notebook full of scrawled handwriting and odd diagrams. The contents focus on manifestation of physical phenomena via psychic power. This won't be useful for learning powers any longer, but is still a handy reference.
